philosophy.title: Treatment Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: I believe that every patient deserves personalized care and specialized treatment. I strive to create a safe and comfortable environment where patients can express themselves freely and work together towards healing and recovery.
philosophy.paragraph2: I adopt a comprehensive approach that integrates medication and psychotherapy, focusing on each patient's individual needs and unique circumstances.
